name: Card Flipper Bot
description: Your ultimate Pokemon card value tracking assistant! Card Flipper Bot analyzes PSA card prices from GameStop, identifies undervalued cards with profit potential, and provides detailed market analytics to help you make informed trading decisions.
features: Real-time PSA card price tracking from GameStop
Automated profit/loss analysis with percentage calculations
Interactive price trend charts and visualizations
Automatic alerts for undervalued cards with profit potential
Weekly profit snapshots and comprehensive statistics
Advanced card matching with character abbreviations
Detailed sales history from PSA auction results
Queue management system for high-volume processing

changes: Enhanced Instagram integration with rate limiting
Improved error handling and logging
Added subscription channel validation
Added Instagram posting functionality
Implemented advanced rate limiting
Enhanced chart creation with QuickChart
Major rewrite with subscription system
Added Discord premium features integration
Improved PSA data scraping
Fixed bug with card flipping calculations
Enhanced price comparison accuracy

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using Card Flipper Bot, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you do not have permission to use the Bot.

sections.heading: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: Card Flipper Bot tracks PSA card prices from GameStop, provides price comparisons and profit analysis, creates data visualizations, monitors specific channels for card listings, manages keyword-based notifications, and posts updates to social media platforms.

sections.heading: 3. Premium Features
sections.content: Premium features may be offered for additional fees. Payments are processed through Discord's payment system. Premium subscribers get access to automatic alerts, advanced analytics, and priority processing. No refunds will be issued for premium features.

sections.heading: 4. Data Usage
sections.content: The Bot collects and stores card price data, user commands and interactions, server configurations, button click analytics, and user preferences for notification settings. All data is used solely to provide bot functionality.

sections.heading: 5. Limitations
sections.content: The Bot provides price information for educational purposes only. Users are responsible for verifying all data before making purchasing decisions. We are not liable for any financial losses resulting from bot usage.

sections.heading: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We collect Discord user IDs, server IDs, channel IDs, command usage data, button interaction data, card price tracking preferences, and subscription status information necessary for bot operation.

sections.heading: 2. Data Usage
sections.content: Collected data is used to provide bot functionality, track feature usage, improve service quality, maintain user preferences, generate analytics reports, and manage subscription services.

sections.heading: 3. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, and destruction. Data is stored securely and access is limited to essential operations.

sections.heading: 4. Third-Party Services
sections.content: The Bot integrates with Twitter API, Instagram Basic Display API, GameStop website, PSA website, QuickChart API for visualizations, and Discord's subscription services.

sections.heading: 5. Data Retention
sections.content: User data is retained only as long as necessary to provide services. Users may request data deletion by contacting support, subject to legal and operational requirements.

name: Mercari Japan Bot

Provides personal alerts, server-wide monitoring, role pings, watchlist management, and sophisticated subscription tiers for collectors, resellers, and communities seeking rare Japanese marketplace finds.

Comprehensive error handling and logging system
Mobile-optimized interface with ephemeral message support

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using Mercari Japan Bot, you agree to these Terms of Service. This bot provides marketplace monitoring and notification services for educational and informational purposes related to Mercari Japan marketplace intelligence.

sections.heading: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: Mercari Japan Bot provides real-time monitoring of Mercari Japan listings, automated notifications, price tracking, personal alert systems, watchlist management, translation services, and comprehensive marketplace analysis through integration with Mercari Japan's API and related services.

sections.heading: 3. Data Sources and Accuracy
sections.content: Market data is sourced directly from Mercari Japan's official API. While we strive for accuracy, data may have delays or inaccuracies due to API limitations or network issues. Users should verify all information independently before making purchasing decisions. Real-time monitoring operates on 15-minute intervals.

sections.heading: 4. Permitted Use
sections.content: Users may use the bot for marketplace research, price monitoring, collecting guidance, educational purposes, and legitimate business research. All usage must comply with Mercari Japan's terms of service and applicable laws. Personal alerts and watchlist features are provided for individual user convenience.

sections.heading: 5. Prohibited Activities
sections.content: Users may not use the bot for market manipulation, fraudulent activities, excessive automated requests that could impact service availability, violation of Mercari Japan's or Discord's terms of service, harassment of sellers, or any activities that violate applicable laws or regulations.

sections.heading: 6. Subscription Tiers and Billing
sections.content: The bot operates on a subscription tier system managed through Discord's Server Subscriptions. Trial periods are limited to 7 days per server. Subscription management, billing, and refunds are handled exclusively through Discord's platform. Keyword limits are enforced based on active subscription tier.

sections.heading: 7. Personal Alerts and Notifications
sections.content: Personal alert systems require user setup and configuration. Webhook URLs must be valid and secure. Users are responsible for managing their alert criteria and delivery preferences. We are not liable for missed notifications due to Discord outages, API limitations, or user configuration errors.

sections.heading: 8. Watchlist and Data Management
sections.content: Watchlist data is stored securely and associated with Discord user IDs. Users can remove items from their watchlist at any time. Flagged seller data is community-driven and provided for informational purposes only. Users should exercise independent judgment when evaluating sellers.

sections.heading: 9. Service Availability
sections.content: Service availability depends on Mercari Japan API access, Discord platform availability, and server infrastructure. We reserve the right to modify features, implement usage limits, temporarily suspend service for maintenance, or discontinue the service with reasonable notice to users.

sections.heading: 10. Translation Services
sections.content: Translation services are provided through third-party APIs and may not be 100% accurate. Users should verify translations independently for critical information. Translation verification prompts are provided to help ensure accuracy, but users are responsible for final translation decisions.

sections.heading: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We collect Discord user IDs, server IDs, guild information, command usage data, search keywords, alert configurations, watchlist data, subscription status, feedback submissions, and interaction analytics necessary for bot operation and service improvement.

sections.heading: 2. Marketplace Data Processing
sections.content: Marketplace data is sourced from Mercari Japan's official API, processed in real-time, and temporarily cached for performance. Search queries and alert criteria are stored to provide ongoing monitoring services. Item data is cached to prevent duplicate notifications and improve response times.

sections.heading: 3. Personal Alert Data
sections.content: Personal alert configurations including search terms, price ranges, condition preferences, and delivery methods are stored securely and associated with user IDs. Webhook URLs are encrypted and used only for notification delivery. Users can delete alert data at any time through bot commands.

sections.heading: 4. Watchlist Management
sections.content: Watchlist data includes item IDs, titles, prices, seller information, and status tracking data. This information is stored to provide ongoing item monitoring and status updates. Users can remove items from their watchlist or clear all watchlist data through bot commands.

sections.heading: 5. Subscription and Billing
sections.content: Subscription status is tracked through Discord's Entitlements API. We do not store payment information, which is handled exclusively by Discord. Subscription data is used only for feature access control and service provisioning. Trial usage is tracked to prevent abuse.

sections.heading: 6. Translation and Language Services
sections.content: Translation requests are processed through third-party translation APIs. Search terms and item titles may be temporarily transmitted to translation services for processing. No personal information is included in translation requests, and translated data is not permanently stored by translation providers.

sections.heading: 7. Community Features
sections.content: Flagged seller data includes seller IDs, flag reasons, and reporting user IDs for moderation purposes. Trial feedback includes ratings, comments, and server information for service improvement. Community data is aggregated and anonymized for analytics purposes.

sections.heading: 8. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures including encrypted data transmission, secure API authentication with DPoP tokens, access logging and monitoring, regular security audits, secure storage of user configurations, and protection of webhook URLs and sensitive user data.

sections.heading: 9. Third-Party Integration
sections.content: The bot integrates with Mercari Japan API, Discord's platform and services, translation APIs (Google Translate), exchange rate APIs, GitHub for documentation hosting, webhook services for notifications, and Discord's Entitlements API for subscription management.

sections.heading: 10. Data Retention
sections.content: Command usage logs are retained for 30 days for debugging purposes. Alert configurations are retained until deleted by users. Watchlist data is maintained for active monitoring. Trial feedback is retained for service improvement. Market data cache is cleared regularly to ensure freshness.

sections.heading: 11. User Rights
sections.content: Users can request information about their stored data, delete personal alert configurations, clear watchlist data, remove saved searches, request account data deletion, opt out of feedback collection, and remove the bot from their server to stop data collection.

sections.heading: 12. Analytics and Improvement
sections.content: We analyze usage patterns to improve monitoring accuracy, optimize notification systems, enhance translation quality, develop new features, maintain service reliability, and provide better user experiences. All analytics data is anonymized and aggregated.

name: Auto Pinger Bot
description: The ultimate Discord keyword monitoring and notification system with advanced role management, interactive request handling, and intelligent message forwarding. Auto Pinger Bot provides comprehensive server automation for communities that need reliable, customizable notification systems with enterprise-grade features.
features: Advanced keyword detection with OR, AND, and EXACT phrase matching
Interactive request system with approval/denial buttons and persistent views
Automatic role creation with custom names and hex color support

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using Auto Pinger Bot, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you do not have permission to use the Bot.

sections.heading: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: Auto Pinger Bot provides keyword monitoring, role management, message forwarding, and notification services for Discord servers. The bot creates and manages roles, monitors messages across channels, sends notifications based on keyword matches, and provides comprehensive server automation tools.

sections.heading: 3. User Responsibilities
sections.content: Users are responsible for appropriate keyword selection, role management, and ensuring bot permissions are properly configured. Server administrators must set appropriate manager roles and monitor bot usage to prevent spam or abuse.

sections.heading: 4. Data Usage
sections.content: The Bot collects and stores server configurations, user requests, role information, keyword lists, message metadata for forwarding, and usage analytics. All data is used solely to provide bot functionality and improve service quality.

sections.heading: 5. Limitations and Disclaimers
sections.content: The Bot provides notification services on a best-effort basis. We are not liable for missed notifications, false positives, or any consequences resulting from bot usage. Users should verify critical notifications through alternative means.

sections.heading: 6. Service Modifications
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes when possible. Continued use constitutes acceptance of modifications.

sections.heading: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We collect Discord server IDs, channel IDs, user IDs, role information, keyword configurations, message metadata for forwarding purposes, request history, and bot interaction data necessary for service operation.

sections.heading: 2. Data Usage
sections.content: Collected data is used to provide keyword monitoring, role management, message forwarding, request processing, service analytics, and feature improvements. Data is not shared with third parties except as required for bot functionality.

sections.heading: 3. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures including encrypted storage, backup systems, access controls, and regular security audits to protect user data from unauthorized access, modification, or disclosure.

sections.heading: 4. Data Retention
sections.content: Server configurations are retained while the bot is active in your server. Request history is maintained for administrative purposes. Users may request data deletion by removing the bot from their server or contacting support.

sections.heading: 5. Third-Party Services
sections.content: The Bot integrates with Discord's API and services. No other third-party services have access to your data. All processing occurs within Discord's infrastructure or our secure servers.

sections.heading: 6. User Rights
sections.content: Users have the right to access their data, request corrections, request deletion (subject to operational requirements), and withdraw consent by removing the bot from their server.

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using TCGPlayer Bot, you agree to these Terms of Service. This bot provides market data and analysis tools for educational and informational purposes related to trading card game investments and collecting.

sections.heading: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: TCGPlayer Bot provides real-time card pricing data, sales analytics, market trend analysis, investment opportunity scoring, file processing capabilities, and comprehensive market intelligence tools through integration with TCGPlayer's official API and marketplace data.

sections.heading: 3. Investment Disclaimer
sections.content: All market analysis, investment scores, and recommendations provided are for informational purposes only. Users are responsible for conducting their own due diligence before making any financial decisions. Past performance does not guarantee future results. The bot is not liable for investment losses.

sections.heading: 4. Data Accuracy and Limitations
sections.content: While we strive for accuracy, market data may have delays or inaccuracies. Price information is sourced from TCGPlayer and may not reflect real-time changes. Users should verify all data independently before making purchasing or selling decisions.

sections.heading: 5. Permitted Use
sections.content: Users may use the bot for personal research, market analysis, portfolio tracking, and educational purposes. The data provided should be used responsibly and in compliance with TCGPlayer's terms of service and applicable laws.

sections.heading: 6. Prohibited Activities
sections.content: Users may not use the bot for market manipulation, fraudulent activities, automated trading systems without proper authorization, excessive API usage that could impact service availability, or any activities that violate Discord's or TCGPlayer's terms of service.

sections.heading: 7. Data Processing and Files
sections.content: File uploads are processed temporarily and deleted after completion. Users are responsible for ensuring uploaded files contain accurate data. We are not liable for errors in processed data or any consequences from using processed information.

sections.heading: 8. Service Availability
sections.content: Service availability depends on TCGPlayer API status and Discord platform availability. We reserve the right to modify features, implement usage limits, or temporarily suspend service for maintenance without prior notice.

sections.heading: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We collect Discord user IDs, server IDs, command usage data, search queries, file upload data (temporarily), button interaction analytics, and API usage metrics necessary for bot operation and service improvement.

sections.heading: 2. Market Data Usage
sections.content: Market data is sourced from TCGPlayer's official API and processed in real-time. No personal financial information is stored. Search queries and analysis results are used to improve service quality and user experience.

sections.heading: 3. File Processing
sections.content: Uploaded files (Excel/CSV) are processed temporarily on our servers and deleted immediately after completion. File contents are not stored permanently. Users should ensure sensitive data is removed before upload.

sections.heading: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures including secure API connections, encrypted data transmission, temporary file handling with automatic cleanup, access logging and monitoring, and regular security audits.

sections.heading: 5. Third-Party Integration
sections.content: The bot integrates with TCGPlayer API, QuickChart API for chart generation, Discord's API and services, and temporary file storage systems. No personal data is shared beyond what's necessary for functionality.

sections.heading: 6. Data Retention
sections.content: Command usage logs are retained for 30 days for debugging purposes. Search queries are not permanently stored. API usage metrics are retained for service optimization. No financial or personal trading data is stored long-term.

sections.heading: 7. User Rights
sections.content: Users can request information about their data usage, request deletion of any stored data, opt out of usage analytics, and remove the bot from their server at any time to stop data collection.

sections.heading: 8. Analytics and Improvement
sections.content: We may analyze usage patterns to improve features, optimize API performance, enhance search algorithms, and develop new functionality. All analytics data is anonymized and aggregated.

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using 130 Bot, you agree to these Terms of Service. This bot provides market research and data analysis tools for educational and informational purposes related to eBay marketplace intelligence.

sections.heading: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: 130 Bot provides eBay sold listings analysis, market trend analysis, price intelligence, bulk data processing, automated visualization tools, and comprehensive market research capabilities through integration with 130Point and other data sources.

sections.heading: 3. Data Sources and Accuracy
sections.content: Market data is sourced from 130Point and eBay sold listings. While we strive for accuracy, data may have delays or inaccuracies. Users should verify all information independently before making business or purchasing decisions. Past performance does not guarantee future results.

sections.heading: 4. Permitted Use
sections.content: Users may use the bot for market research, price analysis, trend identification, educational purposes, and personal collecting guidance. All usage must comply with eBay's terms of service and applicable laws. Commercial use is permitted for legitimate business research.

sections.heading: 5. Prohibited Activities
sections.content: Users may not use the bot for market manipulation, fraudulent activities, excessive automated requests that could impact service availability, violation of eBay's or 130Point's terms of service, or any activities that violate applicable laws or regulations.

sections.heading: 6. Queue and Processing
sections.content: The bot uses a queue system to manage requests fairly. Processing times may vary based on data complexity and server load. Timeout limits are enforced to ensure service availability for all users. Users should be patient during bulk processing operations.

sections.heading: 7. File Processing and Data
sections.content: Uploaded files are processed temporarily and deleted after completion. Users are responsible for ensuring uploaded files contain accurate data and comply with privacy requirements. We are not liable for errors in processed data or consequences from using processed information.

sections.heading: 8. Service Availability
sections.content: Service availability depends on third-party data sources, GitHub Pages hosting, and Discord platform availability. We reserve the right to modify features, implement usage limits, or temporarily suspend service for maintenance without prior notice.

sections.heading: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We collect Discord user IDs, server IDs, command usage data, search queries, file upload data (temporarily), interaction analytics, queue position data, and IP address information for VPN monitoring necessary for bot operation and service improvement.

sections.heading: 2. Market Data Processing
sections.content: Market data is sourced from 130Point and eBay sold listings, processed in real-time, and temporarily stored for analysis. Search queries and results are used to improve service quality and user experience. No personal financial information is permanently stored.

sections.heading: 3. File Processing
sections.content: Uploaded files (Excel/CSV/TXT) are processed temporarily on our servers and deleted immediately after completion. File contents are not stored permanently. Users should ensure sensitive data is removed before upload and comply with privacy requirements.

sections.heading: 4. GitHub Integration
sections.content: Search results are automatically uploaded to GitHub Pages for hosting and sharing. These files contain public market data only and do not include personal user information. Files are publicly accessible through GitHub Pages URLs.

sections.heading: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures including secure API connections, encrypted data transmission, temporary file handling with automatic cleanup, access logging and monitoring, VPN status tracking, and regular security audits.

sections.heading: 6. Third-Party Integration
sections.content: The bot integrates with 130Point API, eBay data sources, GitHub Pages hosting, QuickChart API for visualizations, Exchange Rate API for currency conversion, Discord's API and services, and VPN monitoring services.

sections.heading: 7. Data Retention
sections.content: Command usage logs are retained for 30 days for debugging purposes. Search queries are not permanently stored unless saved by user choice. Market analysis results are temporarily cached for performance. Queue data is cleared after processing completion.

sections.heading: 8. User Rights
sections.content: Users can request information about their data usage, request deletion of any stored data, opt out of usage analytics, remove saved searches, and remove the bot from their server at any time to stop data collection.

sections.heading: 9. Analytics and Improvement
sections.content: We may analyze usage patterns to improve features, optimize processing algorithms, enhance search accuracy, develop new functionality, and maintain service quality. All analytics data is anonymized and aggregated.

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using ACO Manager Bot, you agree to these Terms of Service. This bot is designed for legitimate add-to-cart opportunity sharing within sneaker and streetwear communities.

sections.heading: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: ACO Manager provides form creation, bulk upload capabilities, interactive voting, discussion thread management, and administrative tools for organizing product release opportunities. The bot facilitates community collaboration around legitimate retail opportunities.

sections.heading: 3. Permitted Use
sections.content: Users may create ACO forms for legitimate retail opportunities, share accurate product information, participate in community discussions, and use administrative features responsibly. All shared opportunities must comply with retailer terms of service.

sections.heading: 4. Prohibited Activities
sections.content: Users may not share fraudulent opportunities, manipulate voting systems, spam forms or comments, misuse administrative privileges, or engage in any activity that violates Discord's Terms of Service or applicable laws.

sections.heading: 5. Data Management
sections.content: The Bot collects form data, user interactions, voting records, comments, session information, and administrative configurations. All data is used solely for bot functionality and community organization.

sections.heading: 6. Content Responsibility
sections.content: Users are responsible for the accuracy of information in their ACO forms, appropriate use of images and links, compliance with retailer policies, and respectful community interaction. False or misleading information may result in form removal.

sections.heading: 7. Administrative Rights
sections.content: Server administrators and designated role holders have the right to manage permissions, delete inappropriate content, lock discussions, and configure bot settings. These privileges should be used responsibly for community benefit.

sections.heading: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We collect Discord server IDs, user IDs, ACO form content, voting records, comments and feedback, session data, administrative configurations, and interaction logs necessary for bot operation and community management.

sections.heading: 2. Data Usage
sections.content: Collected data is used to provide ACO form management, facilitate community discussions, enable voting and feedback systems, maintain session persistence, generate analytics for improvement, and support administrative functions.

sections.heading: 3. Data Storage and Security
sections.content: Data is stored securely with appropriate encryption and access controls. Session data is backed up regularly to prevent loss. Administrative configurations are protected and only accessible to authorized personnel.

sections.heading: 4. Data Sharing
sections.content: ACO form information is shared within the Discord server as intended. Voting records and comments are visible to server members. No personal data is shared with external services except Discord's API as required for functionality.

sections.heading: 5. Data Retention
sections.content: ACO forms and associated data are retained while active in the server. Session data is maintained for functionality. Administrative configurations persist until manually changed. Users may request data deletion by removing the bot.

sections.heading: 6. User Rights
sections.content: Users can edit their ACO forms, delete their content, view their voting history, access their saved drafts, and request data removal. Server administrators have additional rights to manage community content and settings.

sections.heading: 7. Third-Party Integration
sections.content: The bot integrates with Discord's API, external image hosting services for validation, and Excel/CSV processing libraries. No third-party services have access to sensitive user data beyond what's necessary for functionality.

name: Twitter Restocker
description: Automated social media management bot for Twitter content scheduling and restock notifications.

changes: Initial beta release with Twitter API integration.
